metadata.title: CVE-2021-22942 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A possible open redirect vulnerability in the Host Authorization middleware in Action Pack >= 6.0.0 that could allow attackers to redirect users to a malicious website.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
